game.name: Super Sports Surgery: Rugby
game.description:
Sometimes it becomes important for you to ignore your various vital tasks to help someone who is talented. Although doctors know the tricks and techniques how to overcome the pain of the injured individuals, you will have to help the injured rugby players to get back to their normal life. Here the problem is that you do not have the sufficient medical equipment to get the job done. But, you have a guy who is very confident and ready to perform several surgeries. So, all the best friends to complete the biggest mission of your life!

Super Sports Surgery: Rugby is an awesome sports game for boys from different age groups. In this sequel of popular rugby game, you will have to help all the injured rugby players to cure timely. The team of your most favourite game is in need of a doctor and, luckily, you have been assigned this responsibility. Perform the needful several surgeries with the help of some unconventional tools to help the players get back to the field and enjoy the game again.

Come forward and do this job since you are the only hope for these wounded players. Use the available tools, cure their injuries and save their lives in this beautifully-crafted and popular parody of the surgery games. They will be highly thankful to you if you succeed in your mission. Make sure that you cure their wounds without killing them in this free online rugby game. Unbelievable graphics, crazy options and exciting levels will ensure you play it for hours. Approach the clipboard to get advice on what to do. Perform stiches and wax works perfectly!
